Metadata.title: Bitomun
Metadata.description: Bitomun is the key to unlocking the answers for those who want to learn about Bitcoin. We also support those who have the qualifications and organizations to spread the correct Bitcoin culture and expand the industry.

hero.title: Bitomun
hero.description:
Bitomun is the key to unlocking the answers for those who want to learn about Bitcoin. 
We also support those who have the qualifications and organizations to spread the correct Bitcoin culture and expand the industry.

development.title: Bitcoin Development
development.description: Explore development resources for Bitcoin, Lightning Network, and education.

layer1.title: Layer1
layer1.description: Browse key Layer1 development resources — including libraries, APIs, utilities, and SDKs.

layer2.title: Layer2
layer2.description: Explore Layer2 development resources — from libraries and SDKs to monitoring and routing tools.

education.title: Education
education.description: Access curated learning materials, tutorials, courses, certifications, and books for Bitcoin and Lightning Network development.

education.title: Bitcoin Education
education.description: Learn the philosophy and technology behind Bitcoin. Explore its fundamentals and mechanics through resources designed for everyone — from beginners to developers.

educators.title: Educators
educators.description: Discover leading Bitcoin educators and experts. Gain deeper insights through their courses, talks, and educational content.

books.title: Books
books.description: From essential reading for newcomers to advanced technical books — explore a curated selection to understand Bitcoin in depth.

materials.title: Learning Materials
materials.description: Access tutorials, guides, and video lessons that help you learn and practice Bitcoin at your own pace.

global.title: Global Communities
global.description: Explore Bitcoin centers, organizations, and communities across all continents

internship.title: Internship Program
internship.description: Join internship programs to deeply understand the technology and philosophy of Bitcoin while gaining hands-on experience through real projects. Learn Bitcoin development through lectures and mentoring, and experience contributing directly to the Bitcoin ecosystem through practical work.

development.title: Development Resources
development.description: Curated collection of Bitcoin, Lightning Network, and educational resources for developers, learners, and builders in the Bitcoin ecosystem.

librariesSdks.title: Libraries
librariesSdks.description: Software libraries and development kits providing foundational code for building Bitcoin applications.

apisPayments.title: APIs & Payments
apisPayments.description: Tools and platforms for easy integration of Bitcoin payments in applications.

utilities.title: Utilities
utilities.description: Various tools including transaction simulation, script exploration, blockchain visualization, and code integrity verification.

layer2s.title: Layer 2s
layer2s.description: Technologies enabling extended functionalities like smart contracts and second-layer solutions on the Bitcoin network.

librariesSdks.title: Libraries
librariesSdks.description: Libraries and development kits for building Lightning Network applications.

lspsEnterprise.title: LSPs
lspsEnterprise.description: Enterprise-grade tools and services for businesses leveraging the Lightning Network.

dashboardsMonitoring.title: Monitoring
dashboardsMonitoring.description: Web-based and text-based interfaces for managing and monitoring Lightning Network nodes.

routingLiquidity.title: Routing
routingLiquidity.description: Tools and services focused on managing payment routing and Lightning channel liquidity.

guidesTutorials.title: Tutorials
guidesTutorials.description: Text or video-based educational materials related to Bitcoin and Lightning Network development.

classesCourses.title: Classes
classesCourses.description: Online or in-person formal educational programs for Bitcoin and Lightning Network development.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: Programs that issue certifications validating Bitcoin and Lightning Network development skills.

books.title: Books
books.description: Published books covering Bitcoin and Lightning Network development.

developmentLayer1.description: Comprehensive tools and libraries for Layer1 development

hero.title: Internship Program
hero.description: Join our mission to advance Bitcoin development worldwide through hands-on experience and mentorship.

status.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals interested in Bitcoin development. Check back soon for future opportunities!

expertise.title: Bitcoin Expertise
expertise.description: Learn from industry experts and gain deep understanding of Bitcoin technology and Lightning Network.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.description: Work alongside experienced professionals in the Bitcoin development space with personalized guidance.

projects.title: Real Projects
projects.description: Contribute to meaningful projects that impact Bitcoin development globally and build your portfolio.

stayConnected.title: Stay Connected
stayConnected.description: Can't find the internship you're looking for? Explore our resources and join the Bitcoin development community.
